text: im doneI know no one will see this  I just want to put it out there   The past few days have been some of the worst for no reason  I have been more and more suicidal and today might be the breaking point  I have contacted the suicide prevention hotline twice  They didn t help at all  The first person basically told me to journal  I barely talked to the second person  I hung up after a minute   I want to do it but I feel so fucking lame  I m scared it will hurt or that my boyfriend will be really upset with me  I don t want him to be hurt  by this at all but I know that s not possible  That s kind of why I haven t done it   I lost it tonight  I have been crying so hard that my teeth won t stop chattering  I keep realizing I am pushing everyone away because I am so depressed  No one wants to hear about how much I hate myself but it s all I ever fucking think about   I m so tired of pretending to be fine  I haven t told anyone that I am this suicidal  I have been thinking about taking pills or driving my car off the road  I even looked up how to tie a noose earlier  I don t know which way would be the least painful  I don t know what I am going to say to my friends and family   I want to do it so I don t have to keep suffering  I am so tired of being alive  I hate the world and everything in it  I wish I could have enough courage to actually do it  I m tired of ruining everyone s life  I m tired of having to be around me

text: Just want it to endEveryday is the same  I wake up feeling optimistic  thinking that today is another day  I slog through work and come home with zero motivation to do anything but waste away in bed   I ve dealt with depression for most of my teens  It usually comes in short bursts  It s hard  but it gets better  I taught myself to be patient and optimistic  because there was always a silver lining  But I don t have that feeling anymore  I can t tell if it s been weeks or months  It feels like an eternity  I try my best to deal with it with humour and optimism  but i just can t do it anymore  All of my hobbies  my escapes from the world  just feel pointless  I have no enjoyment from games  music  being social  I have no enjoyment in general  I m trying my best but I just don t see the point anymore  Every time  I go through the charade again and again and again and for what  I ve spent so long trying to fit in with everyone else that I wasted my teens with no one by my side  I ve always been an outcast  All I ve ever wanted was to be looked to as an equal  but all anyone cares about is I m on the spectrum  They treat me like I m lesser than them because of a stupid title that I never asked for and frankly don t understand flat out   I m just so alone  I feel like I have no one and nothing anymore  I m trying so hard to please everyone but end up pleasing nobody  I want to explain what s going on but they either don t listen or don t care  I don t know what to do anymore  I just want it to end  I can t keep going anymore
summary: Everyday is the same for him. He struggles with depression. He's always been an outcast because he's on the spectrum. He doesn't see the point in trying to fit in with everyone else. He feels alone and depressed.
cleaned: everyday struggle depression outcast spectrum not point try fit feel depress

text: My only goal in the end is death  There is nothing in between  I d rather skip to the end quickly and save the filler This is going to be a long one  It is probably going to be incoherent aswell so be warned Ever since i was   I ve always craved death  It mystified me  It was the one thing i looked forward to  for the better or worse I ve had my share of pain and misfortune  Life never was in my favor   From an outsider standpoint  it would seem as though i had a great life  Sure  i may have a better life than others but it never felt like that My dad is a stoner  he gets angry when he doesnt have pot and is emotionally abusive My mom is bipolar  She lives in denial of it  but everyone she knows has told her she is bipolar Both parents cause me enough stress as it is  But my friends cause stress as well My friends are really cool  I love them  I cant even explain how much I appreciate them for being here Im always scared that they will eventually leave me  I dont know why i am  I always try my best to make sure everyone else is happy  No matter if it hurts me I dont think im an angel  to be honest i think i dont even deserve life  My motivation is at the bare minimum and i know i serve no purpose to this world I have   failed suicide attempts at the age of     of which were between   and  Everyone  besides my friends  who ive talked to about my suicidal ideology thinks its for attention I want to kill myself just to spite them  Just to show them that i wasnt joking I fucking hate everyone on earth with a burning passion  I d never take it out on anyone  but the hate lies within me I take my hate out on myself instead I suffer from depression on a daily basis and a undiagnosed eating disorder   I dont wanna live anymore  There is no point If you re reading this I m sorry  Goodbye

text: Just want to put my story out there Hi   I ve never done this before so I m sorry if it s a mess   My past is filled with abuse and my childhood sucked  Every time I take a shower I get lost in thoughts of the past  Abandoned  Abused  Poor  Every moment must be filled with music or some other distraction or I recede into my mind and it s problems  I can t sleep because of it  Dreams are always nightmares of being killed in different fashions   I ve worked hard  I ve worked for some large companies and finally made it into management making good money  Then I was fired   I ve worked so hard since   After being fired last year  I spent my life saving to start a Buisness  It s failing  I spent ever last penny I have to start a new LLC  A good friend of mine said he needed a consultant  I got everything done then he decided he didn t   I ve been fighting my whole life for the little  so very little I have  I don t want to fight anymore  What s the point of living with nothing for the rest of your life   I m an intellectual who struggles with emotions and it hurts my relationship   The relationship is bland anyway  Arguments  no sex  aggravation   I don t want to fight anymore  I don t want to struggle  I feel this is my maximum potential  It s all slowly slipping away  I ve achieved all I can and I m ready to take my seat on the final swing set   Also  ya know  I d call the help line  but they have the power to call the police  And that would just be the end of it right there  That makes me so angry  Wish someone would listen and not judge   Thank you for reading  Thank you for replying if you do

text: Attempted and failed  Feeling numb I attempted a few weeks ago  I tried once before many years ago when I was in high school  So this was my second time trying  I won t go into detail but it involved poisonous fumes  I was lying there and I started to feel it working  dizziness and extreme tiredness  On the brink of passing out  But then the smoke alarm started going off  It was really loud and it woke up some primal survival instinct and my body was screaming at me to go outside and get some air  I crawled and stumbled out of the house and went outside  My head was pounding and I felt sick to my stomach  I took deep breaths of air  Then I sat there weighing my options  I could go back inside and deactivate the smoke alarms and try again  Or I could call someone  I ended up calling someone  While she was on her way I opened all the doors and windows of my house to air it out  When she arrived I cried and told her what I tried to do   Looking back now weeks later everything still feels really surreal  I feel like I m not supposed to be here  I didn t plan on still being here  So I m awkwardly and slowly trying to get back on my feet  Because my life s obligations and responsibilities are still there  It s a really strange place to be in mentally  Going through the motions of life is really fucking difficult because I m still extremely depressed and I honestly still want to die  But I m still here  For now
summary: A few weeks ago he tried to kill himself with poisonous fumes. It was the second time he tried it, the first time was when he was in high school. The smoke alarm went off and he had to go outside to get some air. He ended up calling someone to come and open all the doors and windows to air it out.
cleaned: week ago try kill poisonous fume second time try time high school smoke alarm go outside air end call come open door window air
